events.text: I…thought I did what anyone else would in my situation…
A  [color=#55FF00][wave amp=50 freq=5]nuclear missile [/wave][/color] strong enough to destroy the nation was launched and I was able to intercept it before anyone was hurt.
Or so I thought…
My interception caused it to [color=#8A0F0F][shake rate=15 level=10]explode [/shake][/color] in the ozone layer.
Showering the land and sea in[color=#8FA329][tornado radius=5 freq=5] radiation[/tornado][/color], but even worse...
It caused the world to begin[color=#47EBB4] [shake rate=15 level=10] freezing over [/shake] [/color] threatening humanity’s very existence.
These shackled hands of mine…are responsible for [color=#8C59A6][shake rate=15 level=10] poisoning [/shake] [/color] the earth and its inhabitants…
Arrested for my crime of global devastation, I was being transported to a high-security prison for execution when the truck was attacked.
Like everything else that’s happened...this attack was calculated.
‘Saved’ by a group of environmental extremists called [color=#00FF80]Gaia’s Advocates [/color], they offered me two choices:
Help them reactivate nuclear power plants across the United States to stop the freezing of the nation, code named plan [color=#F20D0D][tornado radius=5 freq=5] PHOENIX [/tornado][/color].
Or...
Atone for my [color=#CC0000]sins[/color] against the planet with my [shake rate=15 level=15][color=#FFE666]life[/color][/shake] here and now.
Global retribution dispensed from the barrel of a gun...
[center]Make your choice, fool. Don’t waste my time.[/center]

events.question: Will you join Gaia's Advocates to complete plan PHOENIX?

events.text: Then get up. [color=#00FF80]Gaia's [/color] got work for you to do.
Heh, to think someone as subhuman as you could still reek of such arrogance after what they’ve done...
Your birth was humanity’s greatest failure!
Alistair, wait!
Don't do this! We need them!
BANG

You were killed by Gaia's Advocates 


[center]- GAME OVER -[/center]
Despite being the greatest disgrace imaginable to the planet, it’d be a waste to not use your skills to right your wrong.
If you have the ability to ruin the earth, then you also have the responsibility of fixing it.
After you do that, ridding the earth of your stain will be your only other use to anyone. So...
